reviews.text: Clean room, friendly staff. So-so breakfast. Wired and wireless internet(I had better luck with the wired internet). Pool wasn't open so didn't get a chance to use it. Only problem at this hotel is the thin walls, it is near the interstate so you can usually hear the trucks passing by.
reviews.title: Ok for a night or two

reviews.text: The wife and I had a great get-a-way one weekend. Was pleasantly surprised with all the things to do and see in Willcox. Really enjoyed The Days Inn. The complex was very quiet even though it was right on a busy ramp to the interstate. We are going back in Oct 2004 for Rex Allen days with the rest of the family and have our Days Inn reservation in place.
reviews.title: Great Weekend

reviews.text: We arrived in Wilcox late and after driving from Portal decided to try the Days Inns. We were looking for a basic hotel to spend the night before heading on to Phoenix the following day and this hotel fit our needs.
reviews.title: Clean and Basic - Fair Value
not comfortable
reviews.text: Check in was excellent and the service desk was polite and very helpful. The room was standard - clean but could use some updating/paint. We were on the ground floor next to another family with a young child and did not notice excess levels of noise. The area did not seem unsafe. Breakfast was unremarkable - neither excellent or really poor.
Hotel is located within walking distance of a KFC (not recommended), McDonalds and a Safeway (across a parking lot).
reviews.title: Poor Service

reviews.text: Bottom line - a comfortable bed for the night in a characterless room before moving on the next day. Probably wouldn't stay there again but try one of the independents on the old interstate.
reviews.title: Did not feel safe here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Going to Fort Bowie NHS the next day, we stopped here for the night. Looking at AAA Tour Book, we decided that this looked as good as any for a one night stay. We were given a first floor room and it was very scarey..The door had dents in it, the mini frige also had a big dent in it, the bathroom was not clean, and there was alot of noise during the night--traffic and human voices. I did not feel comfortable and was ready to check out at the crack of dawn. My husband insisted that we eat the complimentary breakfast--not good, tables never wiped off. I will be in touch with AAA concerning the 2 diamond rating and will not stay here again.
reviews.title: Why did I stop here
